teaser: A conversation with the founders of She++, an organization built to encourage more women to enter the tech field.
title: Reinventing the image of women in tech
description: A conversation with the founders of She++, an organization built to encourage more women to enter the tech field.
contentencoded:
She++ is an organization built to encourage more women to major in tech fields like computer science. The group also serves as a community of female mentors in the tech industry. Ellora Israni and Ayna Agarwal are students at Stanford University and founders of She++. They joined Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss the importance of getting more women into the field. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 11, 2013
